feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Thu, 09 Nov 2023 08:03:46
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Instacart confirms that most of its retailers charge higher prices through its app compared to in-store prices.
- Exclusive leak reveals details about Humane's AI Pin, which integrates with OpenAI and costs $699.
- Rocket Lab's Electron launch vehicle is fully booked for next year and will resume flights in November.
- Adobe is selling AI-generated images of the Israel-Hamas war, some of which are being used without proper labeling.

Business:
- BMO Alto Accounts: What to know before opening a BMO Alto Savings Account or CD.
- Alliant Credit Union review: Easy membership process with high interest rates on savings and checking.
- Mogul Club raises $3.6M to make real estate investing more accessible.
- Walmart Black Friday deals 2023 include early sales on AirPods, PS5 bundles, air fryers, vacuums, and more.

AI:
- Supercharge Your Testing Workflow: Creating Unit and E2E Tests 10x Faster with ChatGPT-3 Inside NestJS.
- It's time to define levels of autonomy for digital workers and AI agents similar to self-driving vehicles.
- AI research introduces PERF, a panoramic NeRF that transforms single images into explorable 3D scenes.
- Grimes expresses disagreement with AI philosophy at an AI event, then DJs the party.

Other:
- Ukraine's successful ATACMS strike shows Russia's willingness to "take it on the chin" when Kyiv gets new weapons.
- A rapid clean-energy transition could save 181 million years of healthy human life annually by 2050.
- FDA approval of Eli Lilly's Zepbound is a win for patients as Ozempic competitors boom.
- Mississippi sheriff known for torturing Black people and calling his deputies the "Goon Squad" wins reelection.
- Voters in Ohio express anger over the reversal of Roe v. Wade.
- A new interim CEO is hired for the Topeka Zoo.
- Wiley Analytical Science Award 2024: Award Ceremony - 2023.
- Aliens are back in Mexico's congress chambers as a presenter claims to have found a new species.

Insights:
- Instacart's confirmation of higher prices on its app highlights the challenges faced by gig workers and shoppers.
- The leaked details about Humane's AI Pin showcase the integration of AI technology into consumer products.
- Rocket Lab's fully booked launch schedule indicates a growing demand for satellite launches.
- The sale of AI-generated images by Adobe raises concerns about the authenticity of media content.
- The success of Ukraine's ATACMS strike suggests Russia's vulnerability to new weapons.
- The potential health benefits of a rapid clean-energy transition emphasize the importance of sustainable practices.
- Eli Lilly's FDA approval and the booming market for Ozempic competitors indicate advancements in diabetes treatment.
- The reelection of a Mississippi sheriff known for misconduct raises questions about accountability in law enforcement.
- Voter anger over the reversal of Roe v. Wade in Ohio highlights the ongoing debate on reproductive rights.
- The hiring of a new interim CEO for the Topeka Zoo signifies a period of transition and leadership change.
- The Wiley Analytical Science Award recognizes excellence in the field of analytical science.
- The claim of finding a new species by a presenter in Mexico's congress chambers sparks curiosity and interest.
